label: upper
description: U: Upper (Cervical/Proximal esophagus to lower border of azygos vein)

label: middle
description: M: Middle (Lower border of azygos vein to lower border of inferior pulmonary vein)

label: lower
description: L: Lower (Lower border of inferior pulmonary vein to stomach, including gastroesophageal junction)

label: unknown
description: X: Esophagus, NOS; Specific location of epicenter not documented in medical record; Specific location of epicenter not assessed or unknown if assessed
